title: Let's Play Zelda On Nintendo Switch - Kinda Funny Plays
description:
Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: what's up guys I'm Tim Gettys from Kinda Funny and I am about to play The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. I'm very excited about this. This is the first time I played it since the E3 demo uh back in June. We just earlier saw a bit more of what happened after that E3 demo but this is just a different section of the game very early already getting the chance it's going to be a different type of let's play. Uh I don't know how much I'm actually going to be talking during it knowing me I'll probably make a couple clips here and there but I'm going to try to focus on the game opening cut scene action. I'm playing with the Joy-Grip controller, the two Joy-Cons connected to this guy. Open your eyes, wake up Link. The triggers are very clicky kind of reminds me of GameCube uh triggers. The d-pad is interesting too it's weird having a Nintendo d-pad that's not the traditional cross don't how I feel about it yet a little 3DS style button sizewise not a huge fan of but the Pro Controller big old
